title: War and Peace
content:
[War](http://web.archive.org/web/20130215033930/http:/www.olivermunday.com/Fireinthehole.html) and [Peace](http://web.archive.org/web/20130215033930/http:/dart.fine-art.com/aqd-asp-i_63496-buy-artlistinginfo.htm) (that second one might be classed as NSFW, although the first is worse).

I saw these on [different](http://web.archive.org/web/20130215033930/http:/www.underconsideration.com/speakup/archives/003145.html) [sites](http://web.archive.org/web/20130215033930/http:/typographi.com/001085.php) and thought they should be brought together.

Tim
author: timd

comments.content: Thanks Tim BTW, if Love Letters isn't safe for your work, you need a new workplace.

Oh completely safe for my work, nothing more attractive to my mind, however, I don’t want anyone getting it in the neck because they follow one of my links.

Tim
